name: Boatyard Grill
take: Lakefront deck. Fresh catch. The sunset does half the work for the ambiance.

name: Glenwood Pines
take: Cash only. Paper plates. The fish fry is why you drove past six other restaurants.

name: Moosewood
take: The cookbook is famous. The restaurant is better. Carnivores welcome.

name: Maxie's Supper Club
take: New Orleans in upstate New York. The oysters are correct. The po'boys are aggressive.

name: Simeon's
take: On the Commons. Good for the night you want a tablecloth but not a reservation.

name: Coltivare
take: Student-run. Cornell hospitality program. The pasta is better than it has any right to be.

name: Collegetown Bagels
take: CTB. Locals just say the letters. Open early. Coffee is real. Bagels are enormous.
